trans-unit.resname: PAL04·8 | Glacial Ray | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·9 | Circle of Protection: Art | Card Name
PAL04·9 | Circle of Protection: Art | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose an artist.
trans-unit.target: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose an artist.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·9 | Circle of Protection: Art | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice with art by the chosen artist would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice with art by the chosen artist would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·9 | Circle of Protection: Art | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·10 | Mise | Card Name
PAL04·10 | Mise | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.

trans-unit.resname: PAL04·11 | Booster Tutor | Card Name
PAL04·11 | Booster Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of them into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)
trans-unit.target: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of them into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)
